attributes.action: call upon Her Majesty, the Queen to dissolve parliament and call a General Election, failing which we call upon Her Majesty to take this action without a request from the Prime Minister
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We believe that the vast majority of the population would like to have a General Election called as soon as possible to allow us to directly express our displeasure at how our appointed representatives have been misusing our trust and we do not believe that the guilty parties should be responsible for determining how to fix the current system.  Her Majesty, the Queen has it in her power to call for this election and we call upon her to do so.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
